title: I hear that P.F. Chang\'s was looking at getting some land near Texas Roadhouse to build a restaurant.  Is this true?
text: Hello. The local restaurant scene seems to always be in flux, but Liz Biro does her best to stay on top of whatÍs opening and closing. You can read her restaurant buzz, including comings and goings, in the Dish column, most Fridays in the StarNews and online at StarNewsOnline.com/TheDish.
